title: The Dragons Heart
description: Rone is a HoloFae or half-elf in the common tongue. He is also the first one with dark-elf blood in his veins to ever become a Thorn Caller. Rangers born with the ability to wield forest magic. When he learns that both his mentor and the forest he calls home is dying. Rone sets out to recover the Dragons Heart, an ancient relic of power that could save them both. What he doesn't know, is using it may just plunge the entire world into chaos. Or that an evil mage, a master assassin, and possibly even one of his own companions. All want to take it from him.
author: J.D. Styles
